img_text: When you have a street nigga you can't "blow his phone up" It'll either start a argument and throw him off or it'Il make him never answer for you and your then wondering is he ok, it's ok to call like just checking to see if your ok love you,or send a text because if that's really ya nigga he gonna make sure you know he's ok to keep you a ease anyway ! Don't blow nobody phone up y'all bitches be annoying not riders!
